fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role must roll alongside Kukan.
- Their attributes are actually decided by the first 3 roles to die. Seishin will adapt to One attribute from each spirit of the fallen (can be attack/defense and/or ability).
- If Kukan mis-kills or dies, Seishin will lose two of their attributes and join the Foxes the following night(their choice).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill anyone that opposes the Foxes or Outlive Kukan
